description: A thin cotton overcoat, look stylish even during the catacylsm.  This can be worn regardless of your state of mutation
A jacket meant to go over a suit.  Who says you can't look nice during the apocalypse?  This can be worn regardless of your state of mutation
A thin cotton overcoat, look stylish when you brandish your .44 Magnum.  This can be worn regardless of your state of mutation
A jacket meant to go over a suit.  Who says you can't be great looking during a gunfight?  This can be worn regardless of your state of mutation
